title: After transferring an account from EUW to NA server, Account goes missing
body:
I transferred back my EUW server (ex NA server account) account to NA server since I grew tired of my other account. After the transfer process was completed (after the Client gave me a sign to log out to sign in in the NA server), I made an attempt to log in to NA server, but it responds by saying " invalid combination of Username and password". I gave about an hour to re-attempt logging in, but the result remained the same. I tried to log back in on EUW server, for I thought the transfer process takes long time, but the server responded by saying "this account has been transferred to another region, please log in on corresponding server." This indicates that my account was transferred to NA server, yet It seems to be that the account does not exist in NA server as I could tell from the failure log in attempt in NA server. My account has gone missing. I have been realizing lately that services Riot offers are no longer acceptable. Right before this error occurred, I was facing an issue of not being able to purchase RP. Whenever I tried to make a purchase, the server responded "you have reached the maximum transaction, come back 24 hours later" despite it was my very first transaction in 2 month. This still remains unresolved. 
So the account disappearance error is no surprise to me, but if anybody has helpful suggestion, please do comment below

replies.body: As I was going through google search result in a pursuit of solution for my problem (since Riot isn't capable of), I encountered this my very own board, and said [deleted] After transferring an account from EUW server to NA server, account goes missing. Deleted? are you serious?!

Is the account having this issue the same one you're posting from?  Sometimes it can take some time for a transfer to finish processing.  Looking into this, it looks like you're currently in a ranked team so a transfer wouldn't be possible.  Let me know if you're still having an issue!
sorry, NuclearAngel is not the account, Aureilon SoI Bot is the one

Thanks for following up with me!  If you remember your original username while you were on NA, can you try logging in with that?  Since transferring back to your original server, your original username has been preserved.  Let me know!
My account name is Drunkenpossum and the summoner name is Jezzthelame btw...
